name: Wave Design System
description:
Wave is an open-source Design System created by FREE NOW. In addition to components and icons, this library includes styles (text, color, and shadows) that are based on tokens. Tokens are created with the Figma Tokens plugin, so if you want to change the styles, it's better to do it with the plugin.


You can easily grab design elements and modify them as needed. 


In addition to the components you'll find in this design library, we provide:


  • An open-source library in the GitHub repository.
  • A live demo site with general documentation and examples of all components and core elements
